thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 29 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Quarto Group Says FY Adjusted Operating Profit Of $7.2 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Quarto Group Says FY Adjusted Operating Profit Of $7.2 Mln

organizations.name: quarto group says fy adjusted operating

text:
March 29 (Reuters) - Quarto Group Inc:
* FY ‍REVENUE $152.5M VERSUS $154.6M​ * ‍FY ADJUSTED OPERATING PROFIT $7.2M VERSUS $17.0M YEAR AGO​
* ‍BOARD HAS NOT RECOMMENDED PAYMENT OF A FINAL DIVIDEND​ * ‍MOVED INTO 2018 WITH CLEAR OBJECTIVES ABOUT CONTINUING TO REALIGN OUR PORTFOLIO WITH BROADER MARKET AND CONSUMER TRENDS​
* ‍SINCE YEAR END, GROUP HAS BEEN TRADING IN LINE WITH BOARD’S EXPECTATIONS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
